name: opelvvg
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cop(c0, c2), cxp(universe, universe)))

stmt.origin: syl2an(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(cop(c0, c2), cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cop(c0, c2), cxp(universe, universe)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, universe))
-| wi(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c2, universe))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe)), wcel(cop(c0, c2), cxp(universe, universe)))

-| wi(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c2, universe))

-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe)), wcel(cop(c0, c2), cxp(universe, universe)))

-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe)), wcel(cop(c0, c2), cxp(universe, universe)))
